author: Staff Reporter
text:
The District Employment Office organises a private sector recruitment camp for men here on January 3. The camp will be held in Danish Mission Higher Secondary School from 10 a.m.

A private company from Chennai Oragadam would be recruiting male candidates in the age group of 18-24 with qualifications from plus two to degree. Salary ranges from Rs. 8,500 – Rs. 20,000 per month, a release said.
title: Recruitment camp on Jan. 3
